title: Roasted root vegetables with thyme and maple syrup
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into batons', '1 large carrot, cut into batons', '1 parsnip, cut into batons', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 to 6 sprigs thyme', 'maple syrup to taste']
